name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak - Limited Edition
storyline: The sprawling Republic of Calvard is experiencing an unprecedented economic boom brought on by post-war reparations. At the same time, feelings of uncertainty stemming from a massive influx of immigrants and bold political reform by the new president are rife. Deep within its capital city, a young man named Van receives a strange job request that threatens to plunge the entire nation into chaos…
summary: The Limited Edition includes The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak - Deluxe Edition, Digital Soundtrack, Mini Art Book, "TRAILS UNCOVERED" 240+ Page Art Book, Disc Digipak Soundtrack, Steelbook, ARKRIDE Solutions Office Business Card Case, Calvardian Cinema" Movie Poster Art Card Set and Collector's Box with "Oct-Genesis" Outer Sleeve.
